website_summaries.verdict: If the somewhat thin material doesn't bother you, this is a mid-priced pad that will most likely fit your mattress and won't aggravate allergies.
pros: Earns praise for how well it stretches to provide a proper fit, even for thicker, memory foam mattresses
Soft down alternative is ideal for those with allergies
cons: Material is on the thin side, and has the tendency to wear out in spots with repeated washings

customer_reviews.title: Not a good company
customer_reviews.text: As a mattress cover, it works ok. It's not waterproof. They omitted the legally required content label so we don't know for sure what it's made out of. On top of that, you can't trust the avarage rating because half of these reviews aren't talking about mattress pads they're talking about other items. So the company just added this mattress pad to an old listing that already had a bunch of 5 star reviews (for the old items) which isn't honest at all. After realizing all this, the whole thing seemed a little too sketchy so I'm going to send it back. Do your research before you buy. I recommend finding something at Homegoods or Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Annand

customer_reviews.title: 100% polyester no cotton no label, paper thin
customer_reviews.text: The first word of the description of this item is "cotton." When it arrived it had that polyester shine and feel. The package said microfiber which is polyester. Since the legally required content label was nowhere to be found I guess I'll have to go with the package. It was also paper thin. I guess you get what you pay for, but the false advertising is really egregious.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: The materials inside are not purely polyester super soft as described
customer_reviews.text: The materials inside are not purely polyester super soft as described. I think they may have made this bed pad in some kind of a plastic related manufacturing site, because i found many broken pieces of "price tag plastic fastener" within the bed pad. Many of those small pieces would stick up the bed pad and prick to my skin, but It wasn't bad enough to bruise my skin during my sleep, but it definitely made me uncomfortable. so anyway, i picked out the ones i found and now i can sleep comfortly on it.. but definitely not a good experience to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Phu T.

customer_reviews.title: Washed once it’s fallen completely upon....
customer_reviews.text: Washed once it’s fallen completely upon ....I understand that the product was cheap but seriously should last more than two months
customer_reviews.author: Gelena

customer_reviews.title: Backing Material Obliterated
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to no end, love Utopia Towels... but this mattress pad has let me down. I washed it on my washer's most delicate setting and also tumbled dry on low. When I went to use it for the first time, I noticed patches of the backing had been obliterated. :( I never even got to use this once. The top material/cushioning looks comfy, but I cannot rate this above a 1-star. Could be a fluke, but I doubt it. I just wanted an inexpensive, comfortable, and cotton-y pad... but this is definitely not the one.
customer_reviews.author: delineated

customer_reviews.title: A $3000 mattress for a couple hundred
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for replacing a pillow top on a mattress that has seen better days. I removed the foam from the pillow top and put in a 3 inch foam, used the cover and it was like having a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality fit and feel. I've got a queen feather bed from amazon that was nice for a few weeks then we had quills poking threw our sheets. This quilted mattress pad fits easily on our 11" thick memory foam mattress with a feather bed under the pad, its fit is excellent with or without the feather bed under the pad. I would purchase this item again its of good quality and excellent fit
customer_reviews.author: Bitwave

customer_reviews.title: Fits king nicely
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on my bed and I am more than happy with it right now. I had bought a mattress pad from Walmart a while ago and it just fit the bed, right fit, king size. After a while and a few washes on the old mattress pad it started ripping in spots. This one FITS nicely, loose but fitted loose. I don't have to stretch it to get it on the bed. We have a king size mattress with a memory foam topper on it. It's about 10.25 inches deep and I have room to spare to tuck under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a similar one last year at a bargain price and loved it. This one not so much. It is thin, and worse: it is 2" too long and 2" too wide for my full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Trish of ME

customer_reviews.title: Waaay too big
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge, its not for a King mattress it must be for a "Giant" mattress because it is way too big for a king size mattress. the pad is so big I have to fold all 4 edges of the padded part under the mattress to keep it from bunching up on the top of the mattress where I want it to be smooth and soft. I even washed it and dried it but it didn't shrink a bit. I don't know if they make them all this big now or what?!?! I am afraid to buy a different brand for fear it will be this big as well. I just want one that fits properly.
customer_reviews.author: KEVEN J NIELSEN

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Updated: after another week of using this, I’m so annoyed with it that we just ordered a different, more expensive one. This thing just will not stay put and bunches up in these huge ridges if we move around at night. We have a 12” mattress, which is fairly typical, so I wouldn’t buy this unless you’re sleeping on something much thicker. Original review: It’s just ok. It doesn’t fit our mattress very snuggly and so bunches up after a few days, even when I make sure to pull it really snug while I’m putting it on. I’d be more upset if we’d paid more for it, but we’ll probably replace it with something higher quality in the future.
customer_reviews.author: hettie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING....HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the bad reviews on this mattress pad before I bought it and was a little worried about ordering it. Boy I couldn't have been more wrong! This pad is super! It is thicker than I thought it was going to be...softer than any mattress pad I have every owned...and fit my mattress like it was custom made! I have nothing but AMAZING things to say about this mattress pad! I HIGHLY recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wittmuss

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for "Off Label" Uses TOO!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to encase the mattress to protect the bottom from friction wear by the metal bars and springs of the platform style frame. However, I didn't want the noise or feel of the bed-bug and incontinence protectors. Putting one quilted mattress pad on the bottom, then covering out with another on the top of the mattress Worked Perfectly! In addition to protecting the bottom from excessive wear, the quilting keeps the mattress from slipping on the frame. This solution was not only the quietest and most comfortable, it was also the most cost effective and easiest to implement!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Not too snug, not too loose
customer_reviews.text: It fit just about perfectly - snug enough not to form wrinkles over night, but not so snug that it is difficult to put on. Also, the side fabric is strong enough not to rip when stretching over the mattress (a problem I have had with "expensive" mattress covers). Why not five stars? Side fabric could be just a little stronger and it is not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: TinklePitTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not too puffy; great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this mattress pad. These days, it's hard to find a mattress pad that's not hugely puffy. Our mattress is already topped with soft foam, so we didn't need a mattress pad like a giant pillow. This one is thick enough to smooth over the mattress, but not super-thick. It doesn't have the "cliffs" at the edges of the padded area that annoyed me on our previous mattress pad. Also, the fitted sheet now stays flat instead of wrinkling up. You can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: California resident

customer_reviews.title: The stains are red and look very much like blood. disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two mattress pads in twin size for a day bed and trundle in a spare room we're renovating. We just finished the renovation, and took the mattress pads out of the packages to put on the beds before the sheets. When we opened and spread out BOTH of the pads we were appalled to discover stains on BOTH pads. The stains are red and look very much like blood. disgusting. do not order. worse yet, the return window just closed and i cannot get a refund for these obviously previously used pads.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. The great reviews fooled me, but I guess customers liked the rock bottom price of this mattress pad. It has almost no padding and the elastic does not keep the pad snug against the mattress. It's fine for an institution, deer camp, prison or a bed wetting child. I will donate it and buy a new pad, based on price and brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Noca

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My parents had a very nice mattress protector they got from Sleepy's. I wanted something like that without spending the big price. Looking at this ones price I thought it was gonna be cheap quality but after reading all the positive reviews I went ahead and bought it. Having it on my bed I can say this definitely deserved all the high reviews and it fit on my bed like a glove. Great Amazon purchase here
customer_reviews.author: Nas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Liked this so much the first time (6 months ago), I bought one for another room. So this review if for the one I've had the longest. Quality is great for this price! Washes and wears well. No pilling or clumping of filling. Elastic is good, goes all the way around and holds on bed well. When I pull my fitted sheet off, it stays in place better than my previous one. Both one I bought were for queen beds. Will definitely buy again. Oh, and it arrived when it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and unusable
customer_reviews.text: Pad was defective. One long side of the pad was sewn so short that it's impossible to fit the pad on the bed. So short that I couldn't even make it fit on a double mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Anne T.

customer_reviews.title: No Vinyl Back But Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product specifically because it said, "Vinyl back" in the description. The one that arrived does not have a vinyl back, and, therefore, will not meet my needs. A non-vinyl back will not stop leaks, period. This is not a pad for people with pets or possible people leaking issues; it's just a light barrier. I give the product three stars because a) the product is a fine, generic, thin cover (good quality) and b) the company responded quickly and politely to an email I sent them informing them of the differences between the product and the description. They offered to provide a refund, even though I had not asked for one.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Mom

customer_reviews.title: CAUSES BEDBUGS INFECTION
customer_reviews.text: Im 100% sure this product caused a bed bug infestation.. I haven't been out of the house in 2 months because of quarantine and this was the only new item to be brought into my room. Do yourself a favour and wash this product with highest temperature water or else you'll end up with bite marks 2 weeks later the way i did. However i gave this product 2 stars because it met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Taruna Mangar

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more and get a better one... Gets Hot
customer_reviews.text: I should have spend more money and got a better one. Had a funny smell for a while. It slips all over the bed, hard to keep in place. I have a king size. It gets hot very easily, regardless of room temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this mattress pad. I have fibromyalgia and have difficulty getting comfy in bed. I already had a pillow top mattress, but it's getting on in years and the pilling is obnoxious... particularly under light sheets. This pad did the trick! It fit over my pillow mattress perfectly - the pockets are SO generously deep (I was a little worried about the fit, but it really is perfect). I highly recommend getting this mattress pad. You can't beat the price and quality. It also arrived quickly and packaged wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: SEBTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Well, at least it fit
customer_reviews.text: It felt well, but that was about all it did. This sheet is really not much different than just a regular sheet. There's no padding whatsoever, and there's no way this thing is cotton. My body tends to sweat a lot when it's a polyester material since it doesn't breathe as well, and this sheet was no exception. I used it, it's doing the job for now, but I would not buy it again, nor would I recommend it. I'm buying a replacement right now, and as soon as I pull the bedding next to wash it, this cover is out.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Had elastic all the way around, fit perfectly on my bed, super comfortable! So happy with my purchase! I no longer have to worry about my sheets sliding off because the mattress pad didn't fit right and it was cheaper than the crappy one that did that. Highly recommend! I have a 10" thick queen memory foam mattress, like I said excellent fit! Oh and the sides are made of a material not the skimpy elastic stuff
customer_reviews.author: Summer M.

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, once again I did not pay enough attention to some of the reviews before buying. The elastic in the hem snapped the very first time I tried to put it on, and though the fit seemed correct, the band broke on the first stretch. I left it on anyway, with the thought it still might provide some use, but when it came to launder, I just threw it away. Guess you get what you pay for. NOT recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great find - just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: #1 I loved that I could find this item online and they could deliver it to me the next day. I had an old one that fell apart and I only had one day to get another one before the bed needed to be used again. Anyway, the mattress pad was just want I was looking for; good material quality, no plastic or rubber in it, fits great since it is a little bigger than my small twin mattress so it's easy to put on and have it stay on. This product would be great at any price, but I was glad that it was reasonable even when I paid the extra $5 or so to have it shipped overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: said it was 100% cotton, but it's not, but still a decent mattress pad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, basic mattress pad. I ordered a full but was sent a queen in full packaging. Turned out to be fine because we exchanged the mattress for a queen anyway. I only wish these were made from 100% cotton. because no matter how "cooling" they're supposed to be, polyester just doesn't breathe. I couldn't however find a single 100% cotton mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mattress pad. Protection, fits well, well-made
customer_reviews.text: This is not good to be the thickest and most luxurious mattress pad you ever bought. It's protection between the sheet and the mattress. No matter how nice your sheets are, if you don't use some form of cover your mattress will ultimately show early wear. This cover is simple protection. It has a little padding to make it feel good. It washes easily. It holds its shape. It has not torn or ripped and looks good after the dryer. Great pad for the price
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any padding. Sometimes I regret listening to other Amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Santacruz

customer_reviews.title: This mattress pad is a joke (for lack of a better word).
customer_reviews.text: The description says it is a pad that covers your mattress. It does not match the description: *** "SOFT AND COMFORTABLE - The super soft quilt with fiberfill has additional loft that provides extra comfortable sleep and protection; vinyl back and elastic all around secures the pad into position AN IDEAL CHOICE - This mattress pad is a perfect choice if you're considering a comfortable, soft, breathable and high quality mattress pad" *** This pad is super thin and flimsy. It offers no padding to the bed. It is very poor quality and looks like it would easily tear if used with people that toss and turn at night. Definitely not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same cover last year for my daughter’s dorm mattress. Last year she needed a twin, this year she needs a full size for her apartment. Obviously she loves it or I wouldn’t have bought it two years in a row
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Wagner

customer_reviews.title: It was a good price and it fits the bed perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this mattress cover. It was a good price and it fits the bed perfectly. The cover is not too thick, but thick enough to do what it's supposed to do... protect my mattress. I am particularly happy that it does not cause me to overheat, which is why I threw my last mattress pad away within a couple weeks. So, for what it is, I'd probably give this a "five star" rating, That said, after I received this is found a nicer item for the same cost at Costco, so I dinged a star for overall value.
customer_reviews.author: julieann22

customer_reviews.title: Good option for a mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for three years on several different beds and they have held up great. They add a nice level of softness and they hug the bed nicely so they don't get what you do with lesser ones where they move around underneath your sheets. My only complaint is that one of them seems to have lost some stretch on their elastic bad. Not too much but it's losing some tension in it. I like them enough that I would buy another when it loses it completely but at this rate, it will probably last another few years.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Vail

customer_reviews.title: hardly a mattress pad more like a thin protector
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, hardly a mattress pad more like a thin protector. Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: KatGrrlCT

customer_reviews.title: Beat my expectations
customer_reviews.text: For a new mattress, all that's needed is a little protection, and a layer that's easily removed for washing. The premium, high-loft pads are for after the mattress has had a few years' wear. I bought a basic mattress pad, and I'm pleasantly surprised at the quality. It's not a premium, but it's certainly better than a typical basic line. It seems to be well-made, and the surface fabric is smoother than expected. The skirt will fit a deep mattress, and is of a much better quality than the one I just removed from the old mattress. So, two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: Definitely needs washed upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover was a mess when I received it. It was completely covered with what appeared to be shredded cotton batting and smelled strange. I looked at tag and it is from China. I washed and dried it and lint tray was full of white lint. The material used on sides looks thin so not sure how well it will hold up. With that being said it is very soft and fits our thick mattress well. It is comfortable, too. I would just recommend to manufacturer to make sure it is clean and lint free before packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Saved my mattress
customer_reviews.text: Worth it. Bought a new mattress and debated buying a new mattress pad. Wasn't sure but the reviews on this one were good and the fact it was water resistant was a plus. In the end it was a good call as we had a storm a few weeks ago and the roof leaked, coming in thru the ceiling of the bedroom and onto me and the bed. Mattress pad was wet... mattress was not. Well, roof leaked again today during a storm and it did not save my mattress. So now I have a ruined mattress a worthless mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: LabrynthTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: We were very happy with the quality of this mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this for our 10 inch memory foam mattress. We were very happy with the quality of this mattress pad. It's not one of the cheap thin ones that you often find a local discounters. The reason I made this purchase on Amazon is because I was not finding what I needed at stores like target and Walmart. They had some in stock but they were more expensive and didn't seem to be as high quality as this one is. I highly recommend this mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Kate in the Desert

customer_reviews.title: Covers for the WIN!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress cover. I purchased 2 for both my mattress and also my son’s. We already have great quality mattresses but the cover adds a level of comfort and softness along with protection. They wash well and are easy to maintain. Fit like a charm. I ordered these when we were moving into our new home and so I put the mattress cover on and then the big plastic mattress bags and so I felt comfortable with the movement and keeping my investments safe and sanitary during such a hefty move. I definitely recommend these covers!
customer_reviews.author: camille crawford

customer_reviews.title: Servers its purpose but may arrive with schmutz on it.
customer_reviews.text: After removing the item from it’s clear plastic bag, I noticed dark lines in a couple of areas on the fabric. They appeared to be dirt or something that perhaps the fabric was pressed up against that caused these marks. I placed it in the wash, as I was intending to do anyway, and the lines did not come out. Using a damp cloth and some scrubbing, the lines seemed to diminish. I missed a line as you can see and will be removing it as well. Going to throw in a second wash but this time with bleach.
customer_reviews.author: James Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I guess you cannot have a good Mattress Pad for $20, need to spend more money for decent pad, sending back
customer_reviews.author: Grateful customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded from a queen bed to a Cal King. I had this mattress pad on my old mattress and it was very soft and nice, so I decided to get the same one again. It does not seem to be as high quality as my previous one. Plus it doesn't fit properly. It's loose and ends up lumpy, which is not because of depth. Even the surface area of it overlaps all sides. Now I'm shopping around for another one.
customer_reviews.author: TishaMoon

customer_reviews.title: Protect your mattress investment
customer_reviews.text: I just sent an old bed to a used bed seller. After I pulled one of these covers from the bed, the mattress was as clean as new,. It was about 10 years old. My husband suffers from night-sweats, and not a single stain got through to the underside of these padded protectors. Well worth the extra expense to protect your mattress investment.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: Mattress pad arrived stained and had two holes in it, In addition it did not fit well, it was not meant for a full mattress as advertised. Overall disappointed in the quality of the product and was returned. Upon returning since it was sold by a third party I had to cover packing the item which cost an additional 9.00 dollars from UPS overall stay away unless you want to receive a dirty used bed quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Nice "pad" man
customer_reviews.text: Nice "pad" man. I moved into a new apt' after seperating from my wife of 46 years (go figure?). She had us downsize before we moved to Spokane 6 months ago, including a near perfect bed in the guest room. So I have had to replace that bed. Grrrr! This pad is very well made and adds additional comfort to the 14 inch gel foam, memory foam, another foam, and a 4th layer of another kind of foam matress that is 14 inches thick. Fit with just a few inches to spare. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz-ard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on since it fits up to a 15" deep mattress. AND it stays in place because it's tailored to queen size (60x80) properly. Probably the best mattress pad I've ever had and I'm not young.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Hayes

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE! Seams are coming apart and it’s brand new out of the package!
customer_reviews.text: This product is going to be returned. Unfortunately, I can not provide any review on how it fits on my mattress and the like. As soon as I removed this product from the packaging I inspected it. The stitching is falling apart. Unacceptable. Also, this company fails to put any sort of tag on this product. I don’t know what the materials are. There are no care instructions listed. I am not going to log onto amazon every time I need to wash this thing. Save your money. Don’t buy this piece of garbage. I’m going to Walmart tomorrow to buy a similar item.
customer_reviews.author: truckguy

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Pad
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad fits very well on my deep mattress. It remains in place just as it should. The top seems very durable and thick, and although the grippy sides are thinner they held up to me stretching it over the mattress. It also held up great in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: LillithTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT dry this in your dryer.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress pad was probably all right, but it unfortunately has incomprehensible washing instructions. I wanted to wash it before putting it on the bed but couldn't decipher the silly little pictures on the laundering instruction tag so followed the directions from my old mattress pad - cool water, gentle cycle, dry on low heat for 15 minutes. Well, that didn't work. The underside of the pad melted in several spots. Reported this to the vender and they did refund 50% of the purchase price and were nice about it. I guess I can live with an $11.50 mistake better than a $23 one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schwahn

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect against wetness at all!
customer_reviews.text: This is soft and feels nice on the bed. However, I got it to protect my brand new mattress from my daughter's bed-wetting. It does NOTHING to protect against wetness whatsoever. Literally as soon as she wets the bed, even if I get her up immediately and quickly remove the sheets, it's already gone straight to the mattress. My brand new mattress now has urine stains thanks to this sorry excuse for a "protector." Would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CMurray

customer_reviews.title: Sleep like a baby but without the crying and waking up
customer_reviews.text: My bed has always given me problems because when I bought it, I preferred a firmer mattress. Now, I want a more pliant one. The Utopia Bedding Quilted Fitted Mattress Pad significantly softens the bed and allows it to form more easily to my body. The sellers were communicative, and the product is reasonably priced. No regrets, here! Loretta B
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Pad!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad washed very well, and fit easily on my TempurPedic mattress; the mattress pad accommodates much thicker mattresses, so during the week, it does slide around a little, bunching up. It is soft, and comfortable, and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DFBMan

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress pad I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pad now for about a month. The quilting is comfy without feeling warm during the night, which is great because my wife was against the purchase at first. She likes it cool when sleeping and she's fine with it after trying it out. The main thing I'm impressed with is the pads ability to stay in place. It does move a tiny bit here and there, but I'm very happy with it. It never bunches up under you from moving around at night. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Z

customer_reviews.title: NICE AND THICK!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover was just what I was looking for and the best part is the price is right. It is thick, like you want a mattress cover. I've tried other brands and they are so thin, they offer little protection to the mattress and worse, no extra pad for the sleeper. But this one is great. I will definitely order the queen size when the time comes for my own bed.
customer_reviews.author: aunt emma

customer_reviews.title: I Love this mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: I Love this mattress pad! It has deep pockets so it will fit the mattress perfectly. Sooooooo plush and comfy, I ordered another one just like it! Great price for such a great product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and washes well.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this mattress pad several times and I really like it. It is soft, comfortable, and it washes well. It is not overly padded, but that works well for us. We have had two of them for over a year, and there are no rips or holes, and the have stayed in great condition. We just got my son a larger bed so I needed to order a larger mattress pad. I'm sticking with the Utopia mattress pad, and I also just ordered the Utopia sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Liv D.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Started falling apart after first wash.
customer_reviews.text: I washed mine before I used it and it started falling apart. The threading pulled right out for several inches. Returned. Do not recommend. Poor stitching quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nyairo

customer_reviews.title: Nice, deep pockets
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress pad. Washed before using,no shrinkage and nice, deep pockets. The quilting is good, too. In fact, I bought this for queen sized aerobed and king is a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Bluemaui

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased...
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm really pleased with this mattress pad. It fits well around my thick 15" pillow top mattress. I especially like that it has elastic all the way around and the sides are actually made of cloth, not thin mesh or paper. I have yet to wash it as it's on our spare bed, but I'm hoping it holds up well and doesn't shrink. I realize that this pad isn't waterproof, but I'm okay with that. The trade off is a great fitting pad that seems well made. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mochadelicious

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell when I received it. Also paper thin
customer_reviews.text: It had a bad smell upon arrival. Not sure as to what it was. Did not look used so did not return it. Popped it into the washing machine and the smell disappeared. However, the very basic in mattress pads (not surprising given the $20 price). Don't expect too much (and make sure you wash it before first use).
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: great mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one several years ago when 1st daughter left for college, she loved it and it has held up well. So, I bought this one for 2nd daughter. She also says it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement, but no country of origin indication.
customer_reviews.text: I received this pad promptly, it had little odor and it washed up nicely; it fit my 9" deep mattress perfectly with room to spare. Not sure what else one could want, it beats the heck out of the ratty worn out pad that was previously on my bed. I rated this 4 stars because U.S. regulations require that all articles of foreign origin be conspicuously labeled as such. I could find no indication on the packaging or on the pad of where this was made. I assume it was imported because if it was made in the USA, it would most likely be plastered all over the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kendog

customer_reviews.title: Stitches coming out after <1 weeks use
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover arrived 8/30. I washed per instructions prior to use. Changing sheets first time, the quilting is coming undone. This is not a good sign for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa F

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as fitting "up to 16 inch mattress". Well ...
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as fitting "up to 16 inch mattress". Well my mattress is 14 inches, and this pad is way, way, way too large. I would say it would fit up to at least an 18 inch or possibly larger mattress, as it was completely sagging down several inches on mine, and the wrinkles... oh the wrinkles, yikes. The fact is, if it's too large it's too large, you can't make it smaller. So, I removed and replaced.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseK

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s not at all what’s it’s shown to be, so dis-satisfied with this, not even close to description, bad quality, don’t but it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Z Malik

customer_reviews.title: Uh...... not sized correctly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the queen size, and we have a regular thickness (not pillow top) mattress. After washing this-(in cold water) I doubt it would fit a full size mattress, maybe a twin!!! Should have know I would get what I paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Airehead

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good value.
customer_reviews.text: I was staying in a college dorm for a week-long program, and knew from prior visits that the mattresses had vinyl covers. They were slippery, so sheets wouldn’t stay tucked in, and, if the night was hot, the bedding got damp and uncomfortable. With this mattress pad, my sheets stayed on and my bed was so much more comfortable. The price was low enough that I was okay with leaving it behind to create more room in my suitcase for souvenirs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Yowell

customer_reviews.title: Stain went through the sheet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an Airbnb room. Does not protect the mattress. The stain went right through the sheet. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Mattress pad itself is pretty thick and comfortable, my main issue is with the quality of the material and elastic. Right when I put it on one corner of the bed and stretch it to the other the elastic rips. Then I go to the other corner and snags and pulled fabric are already appearing in the padding. It's fine because it's under the sheet and the appearance won't matter, but I don't expect this to last even close to a year. Cheap material and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Corbet

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: this item is an item of get what you pay for. It fits snugly on my full size mattress. I hope it lasts longer and is more durable than it looks. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I chose this particular mattress pad after viewing the video ...
customer_reviews.text: I chose this particular mattress pad after viewing the video which led me to believe that this pad was something special which it is not. The main complaint is that it is barely padded, so we may as well just be sleeping on the mattress itself. Also, it does not fit our deep pocket queen size as indicated. The corners fit snug from side to side fit snug, but not in length, making the pad all lumpy under the sheet. If I didn't really need a pad on the mattress, I'd definitely be returning it. I just have to keep reminding my self that "you get what you pay for" and in this case it's $$$ out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Was not what we were looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually give a review this low, and for someone else this may be great. Though it was very soft, after trying it we realized there was not a difference in the comfort of our bed whether it was on or off of it. Even though I am returning it, as I stated I was looking for something to change the comfort of our mattress not just a mattress cover. It was delivered promptly and we'll packaged though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeniene R

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality mattress cover. I was able to wash it without any problems whatsoever. The instructions said to wash it on cold but I washed it on warm and it was completely fine. Has a nice new smell to it too. Fits my king size bed perfectly and is nice and thick and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sowell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product- stays put
customer_reviews.text: We have a ultra plush pillow top mattress. This cover went over pur mattress perfectly with plently of room to spare in case we wanted to add a mattress topper. The meterial feels very durable on top and the sides are so not thin yoiu would think itnwould rip...best part, the corners syated on place and didnt come up from the mattress after 2 adults,2 kids, a 103 lb dof all took turns tossing and turning! Very pleased with this mattress cover, the shipping time and Utopia!
customer_reviews.author: Durden Family

customer_reviews.title: Basic economy level product.
customer_reviews.text: Basic cheap matress pad. Very thin polyester padding. No perceivable wear after 4 weeks. Basic economy level product. Should fit mattresses up to 15" thick. Product is what one should expect at this price point. Still does the job of a basic matress pad. Good for covering water proof/resistant matress covers.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Very thin - synthetic fabric
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated buying this without hands on viewing first. It is very thin, synthetic fabric. If i didn't need it right now for guests i would have returned it. It fir well and launders well just very thin and synthetic fabric
customer_reviews.author: Mtn Yeti Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend , Fits like a dream! :)
customer_reviews.text: My experience: I absolutely love this mattress pad. The thickness of the mattress pad is not too poofy, it's just right. It feels so soft to the touch and it stretches around my thick queen size mattress like a dream! (No pun intended LOL) The product is very well-made with great quality and care! I Highly recommend this company "Utopia". I purchased a comforter from this company a while back and it feels wonderful, washes perfectly in the washing machine and is so comfortable! Have a beautiful blessed day today everyone! Hope this helps! I am going to continue being a returning customer definitely. Thank you "Utopia" for putting out fabulous quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M Winn

customer_reviews.title: Feels luxurious!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s blow up mattress in her first apartment. It’s intended as a gift, but knowing that she might need to use it without notice or that she might not think of it, I opted to go ahead and wash it in baby detergent (allergen prevention). My husband took it out of the dryer and immediately got jealous!! He wanted to know why our daughter’s guests got the “good” stuff! I felt it and it really did feel luxurious. I might have to replace our matttess pad!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzmom

customer_reviews.title: perfect in all ways
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I've made in a while. I purchased one previously which I thought would fit...wrong!! It is perfect, fits nicely, is large enough and has comfortable padding. Cal-king mattress cover/pads are a challenge to put on sometimes, this was a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not luxurious mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. We ordered a twin. Not extremely thick and lacks structure. After I washed it it looked lopsided, but once we got it on the bed it was fine. Deep pockets. Most mattresses with this kind of drop are pillow top so softness or thickness not really a problem. Works for us. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: WendyF

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit and I bought the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mattress pad, except it doesn't fit. I ordered a California King for my California King bed and the mattress pad hangs off the end. Really weird! No one can see it but me when I make the bed, so I didn't bother to return it. I wouldn't buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolette S.

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for... a mattress pad/covering that is not extremely thick, but serviceable. It seems to be well made. I already have a high-end mattress with pillowtop, so all I wanted is was a good quality, quilted mattress pad with minimal lofting.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: People mention that it is soft, nice, and et.c. I bought this expecting same thing. The sheet heats up and makes you sweat on your back. It was kind a uncomfortable for me. I cut open the sheet to find out what was the all fuss about. But under the sheet it is a just synthetic cotton as you see in this picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very soft protectant
customer_reviews.text: The mattress cover is amazing! It’s been through the wash a couple times when the drier and still keeps its shape. Very soft, and fits over the mattress very well. Love the thought of this because it keeps the sheets protected and if something happened to spill it keeps it protected and stain free. I have always wanted a mattress cover and I would recommend buying these for your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but too tight for memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I have a Lull mattress and should have gotten one of their covers. This one just seems to put a damper on the quality of my mattress. It is soft but tight so I don’t get the feel of my memory foam. I only bought this to not turn my white matters yellow over time.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The one that I got is a little large on the width (mattress is 70", 8" thick), but not a big issue. Mostly should fit tight on a thicker mattress. Also a small part of the stiches is open, but not a problem. It does not slide and the sheet stays in place too. Does not cause sweeting. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Neda

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t believe that this thing would work as well as it did. Out of the box, it is thin and you are working, what did I just spend my money on. Even laying on it for the first time, I didn’t notice much difference. However, I slept completely through the night for the first time on the cheap hard bed at our vacation rental. I woke up with no back pain. For the remainder of the vacation, I sort through the night. That has never happened, which Is why I purchased it in the first place. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: showsomeloveforphilly

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality of 10 years ago
customer_reviews.text: the top and the protective lining are very near the same as the ones purchased 10 years ago but the elastic boarder that is used to keep the pad in place and grab onto the mattress are made as cheap as they could possibly could; I tore two holes in that part of the pad while I tried to put it on the mattress. Once washed they will likely be ready for the trash.
customer_reviews.author: James H Melandry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product stretched well. I find that it is a bit thinner than what I wanted but it works fine on the mattress. I've been looking for another to purchase and definitely going to use this as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bed Cover for Queen Beds!
customer_reviews.text: Gosh, it fits perfectly and has lasted a long time, I'm still using it. It's great for women to act as a protection pad against staining the mattress. It was shipped fast and no troubles at checkout. I like the quality, easy to wash and put back on the bed, plenty of stretch to fit a queen mattress comfortably (not easily pulled off the bed during sleep). Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Toms

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT come close to fitting; as if one side were measured for a smaller bed!
customer_reviews.text: It fits on 3 corners only. The 4th corner, no matter how we turned and stretched it, never came within 2 feet of the corner of the bed! will return!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: Got a new size bed so had to find a new mattress cover which was affordable. I had always gone to the store to buy in the past - first time to order online w/o seeing them first. This cover is a perfect fit for my queen size bed down to the fitted corners. Washes well and is soft. I am pleased with this purchase and when needed, will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ila L Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Mattress Protector at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thick mattress protector which can be used with or without a fitted sheet. I haven't had any spills on it but by the thickness I am pretty sure it would be great at stopping my mattress from being ruined. I gave it 3 stars on temp control because sometimes I get heated up just lying on it. At times this is fine because I am anemic and want that warmth at other times I am hot and don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Pad for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this mattress pad in this price range. It is well made and fits the mattress well with deep pockets. I washed it before putting on the bed, and I was surprised that there was little to no lint in the dryer filter noting that the fiber quality is very good. I like this medium thickness mattress pad because it washes and dries easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Case Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to say about it- basic thin pad, not great but better than the ones I saw at the store in the same price range, which was the point. It was never intended to be a mattress topper, just a layer of protection. It fit over a very thick mattress, elastic and seams are all ok. Went through the wash without falling apart. Even made it through the dryer without melting. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Let’s Be Clear...A Mattress Cover, Not A Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: THIS IS NOT A WATERPROOF MATTRESS PROTECTOR. This is only a cover which looks nice, is soft, fits mattress well (gave a star for each), however, will be helpless against defending liquid attacks on your mattress. Seems to be fine so far. Bought this for my son’s bed and he sleeps well on this, no complaints. We’ll see if he has a spill and this doesn’t do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Telecom Herk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition
customer_reviews.text: This pad is soft enough that, I don't even know it's there, which is great. The material appears to be well-made and protective of my mattress. It is not "scratchy" (as I have seen some other reviewers describe other pads). I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: mbrown877

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, not hot under sheets
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover. It goes on easy and is soft and not sweaty. I’m a very warm night sleeper and this is fine for me. It’s nice and comfy and washes clean. This is my second one because my dogs peed on the other one and i caught It to late. I’ll buy it a 3rd time
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Quilted Fitted Mattress Pad (Queen) - Mattress Cover Stretches up to 16 Inches Deep - Mattress Topper
feature_bullets: MATTRESS PAD - Queen size mattress pad measures 60 by 80 inches; knitted skirt stretches to fit up to 16-inch deep mattress; for best results, please protect the cover from spills as it is NOT WATERPROOF
DURABLE - Quilted mattress pad cover is durable and long lasting and is significant for keeping your mattress free of stains
SOFT AND COMFORTABLE - The super soft quilt with fiberfill has additional loft that provides extra comfortable sleep and protection; vinyl back and elastic all around secures the pad into position
AN IDEAL CHOICE - This mattress pad is a perfect choice if you're considering a comfortable, soft, breathable and high quality mattress pad
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - The cover is machine washable and you can tumble dry on low; do not use bleach

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars24,634 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
